title: Man shot dead in Ahangama
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A man was shot dead in the Panchaliya area in Ahangama last night (4).
Police Media Spokesperson, SSP Nihal Thalduwa stated that the deceased was identified as a 27-year old resident of Dikwella.
The Police Spokesperson said it was suspected that the shooting was a result of drug trafficking, and Ahangama Police are conducting further investigations into the incident.
Russian Embassy is aware that Govt cannot impede on judicial process: Minister
